revised_title: Microscopic Observations of the Optic Nerve Structure and Function
tldr: The author examines the structure of the optic nerve using a microscope and discovers numerous holes resembling filaments. He hypothesizes that the nerve fibers are made up of soft fluid globules, which are exhaled during drying. The author also proposes a mechanism for how the animal spirits representing visual images pass through the optic nerve to the brain.
